select count(1) from SALESLEADSORDER where P_SALESLEADSORDERSTATUS='10'
and P_ACCEPTSTORE=${storeId}

select S.PK, S.P_NAME, S.P_TELEPHONE, S.P_CUSADDRESS, S.P_COMMENT, S.P_SERVERADDRESS, S.P_SERVERPURPOSE, S.P_SERVICETITLE, S.P_FITMENTDATE, S.P_STYLEPREFERENCE, S.P_BUDGET, S.P_BRANDPREFERENCE, S.P_HANDLERCOMMENT, S.P_SALESLEADSORDERSTATUS, S.P_DISTRIBUTEDATE, S.P_DISTRIBUTER, S.P_AGENCYOPERATEDATE, S.P_AGENCYACCEPT, S.P_SUGGESTSTORE, S.P_ACCEPTDATE, S.P_APPOINTMENTDATE, S.P_CLOSEDATE, S.P_AMOUNT, S.P_CALLSERVICETEL, S.P_REFUSEDATE, S.P_REFUSETYPE, S.P_REFUSEREASON, S.P_AGENCYREMARK from SALESLEADSORDER S
, APPUSER AU
, SALESLEADSORDERITEM SI
where 1= 1 AND S.P_SALESLEADSORDERSTATUS='25'
and S.P_ACCEPTSTORE=#{storeId}
and S.P_ACCEPTBY =#{acceptorName} AND S.P_ACCEPTBY = AU.PK
and SI.P_PRODUCTCATETORY = #{productCatelog} AND SI.P_SALESLEADSORDER = S.PK
and S.P_CLOSEDATE between #{fromTime} and #{toTime}
and ${startNum} < rownum and rownum < ${pageSize}+${startNum}+1
order by S.P_CLOSEDATE desc

select SUM(S.P_AMOUNT) from SALESLEADSORDER S
, APPUSER AU
, SALESLEADSORDERITEM SI
where 1= 1 AND S.P_SALESLEADSORDERSTATUS='25'
and S.P_ACCEPTSTORE=#{storeId}
and S.P_ACCEPTBY =#{acceptorName} AND S.P_ACCEPTBY = AU.PK
and SI.P_PRODUCTCATETORY = #{productCatelog} AND SI.P_SALESLEADSORDER = S.PK
and S.P_CLOSEDATE between #{fromTime} and #{toTime}
